message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $20,000. I believe it offers significant value, and this price reflects its quality and potential.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only able to pay up to $12,000 for it. Would you consider adjusting your price?
Bob, I understand your position, but $20,000 is already a competitive price.  Could you meet me halfway at $16,000?
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. While I understand your position, I am still unable to meet at $16,000. Can we discuss a price closer to my budget, ideally around $14,000?
